description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

advisories.affected_versions: All versions starting from 0.0.10 up to 0.0.14
advisories.description:
Affected versions of `ezseed-transmission` download and run a script over an HTTP connection.

An attacker in a privileged network position could launch a Man-in-the-Middle attack and intercept the script, replacing it with malicious code, completely compromising the system running `ezseed-transmission`.



## Recommendation

Update to version 0.0.15 or later.
advisories.not_impacted: All versions before 0.0.10, all versions after 0.0.14
advisories.title: Insecure Defaults Leads to Potential MITM in ezseed-transmission
